articles.author: TOP Indonesia
articles.title: Update WWF Januari 25 Pencairan Rp1,000,000
articles.description: Rencana Pengunaan Dana: The Orangutan Project is thrilled to share the exciting news that Sam and Sule are now considered capable of surviving in the Sumatran jungle on their own without constant supervision. Over the last year, Sam and Sule have often eluded their trackers as they venture further to explore the forest and forage in new areas. When they have again made an appearance closer to the release site camp, they have been in good health and have shown excellent foraging skills.

articles.author: TOP Indonesia
articles.title: Update TOP December 27 Pencairan Rp1,000,000
articles.description: Rencana Pengunaan Dana: Donasi untuk launch of the SRA Rescue Centre!

articles.author: TOP
articles.title: Update TOP Deceember 1 Pencairan RP2,000,000
articles.description: Rencana Penggunaan Dana Pencairan : Donasi digunakan untuk membangun Bora Rescue Center

articles.author: Josh TOP
articles.title: Update WWF November 10 Pencairan RP 200,000
articles.description: Rencana Penggunaan Dana Pencairan : Release two orangutans named Bumi dan Okto to the wild
